casebody.data:
No. 11-7345. Arthur Lee Hairston, Sr., Petitioner v. United States. 565 U.S. 1148, 132 S. Ct. 1041,

181 L. Ed. 2d 792,

2012 U.S. LEXIS 425. January 9, 2012.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 421 Fed. Appx. 310.
